localised_string.last_approved_text: The global recruitment pool is populated with units from all of your faction's buildings, excluding certain elite units. These can be recruited regardless of where your army is situated. However, these come at an additional cost and will take longer to recruit. In time, as your faction accrues more of the recruitment structures with which each unit is associated, recruitment costs and times will fall, and additional global recruitment slots will become available.
